name: Rydunis
description:
Rydunis is an intense arcade shooter that will test your wits and perception equally! Select from eight different battleships and take on hoardes of enemies in four different gameplay modes, each with their own twists, trophies and online highscore tables! Mastering Rydunis is a rewarding experience in more than one way!

Sequel to the critically acclaimed YYG Sandbox games Radunis, Radunis Arc, and Radunis 3D!

Boasting aside, this game has tons of additive blending effects, hundreds of on-screen enemy objects at a time, and four gameplay modes.

  • Classic arcade mode sends a constant stream of enemies towards you, occasionally throwing in a wave or two that surrounds you - think fast or expire!
  • Fusion mode throws bigger fused enemies at you, that breaks into smaller versions when shot, akin to Asteroids. How big can they get? Only one way to find out!
  • Ambush mode constantly surrounds you with waves of enemies, forcing you to think on the fly but rewarding you with a huge chance to rack up combos!
  • Roguelike Mode is basically the three other modes... at the same time. Have fun with that~
